nodes.text: Jag Crag Gorge was a gorge located near the city of Mos Espa on the planet Tatooine. At the time of the Invasion of Naboo, Jag Crag Gorge was part of the Boonta Eve Classic podracing circuit, and pilots such as Anakin Skywalker raced through it. Years later, Skywalker's son, Luke, piloted his T-16 Skyhopper through the gorge before attempting to maneuver though Beggar's Canyon.
